sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均可表示"特别地"之意。
means: specially ： 着重为做某事而"专门地、特意地"，相当于on purpose。
especially ： 较多地用于正式文体，侧重超过其它全部，突出到"特别地"的程度，相当于in particular。
particularly ： 用来指同类中特别突出的一个。

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+specific特有的→共同特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+al……的→adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+fic→具体的,特有的
e+special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]→adj.特别的, 特殊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 似是而非的,华而不实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ous……的→外观相似而实质不同
especial[adj.特别的, 特殊的]+ly表副词→adv.特别, 尤其
special特殊的,专门的+ist专家或人→n.专门医师, 专家
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ity表名词→n.[specialty]特性,性质;专业/长;特产
speci外观,种类,特别+es表复数→[所有]种类
specific[adj.明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的]+ation表名词→n.详述;[常n.]规格,说明书,规范
speci外观,种类,特别+men表物品→n.标本,样本
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ize化→v.[specialise][in]专攻,专门研究,专业化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指定, 详细说明, 列入清单
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ify表动词→specify规类→指定, 列入清单

sentence.cn: 许多坏习惯特别难以改正，因为它们很可能是在很小的时候形成的。
sentence.en: Many bad habits can be especially difficult to cure because they are likely to have been formed at a very young age.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 句子填空 原文

expand_knowledge_list.cn:
especially：通常表示尤其、特别；该词不置于句首
specially：表示特意地、专门地，其后常接designed、developed或made等过去分词

entry.def: You use especially to emphasize that what you are saying applies more to one person, thing, or area than to any others.

example.ex: Millions of wild flowers colour the valleys, especially in April and May...
example.tran: 尤其是在四五月份，不计其数的野花盛开，山谷里一片绚烂色彩。

example.ex: Re-apply sunscreen every two hours, especially if you have been swimming.
example.tran: 每两个小时重新涂一次防晒油，尤其是在游泳的时候。

entry.def: You use especially to emphasize a characteristic or quality.

example.ex: Babies lose heat much faster than adults, and are especially vulnerable to the cold in their first month.
example.tran: 婴儿散热比成年人快得多，在出生后的头一个月特别容易感冒。

means.word_mean: 1. to a distinctly greater extent or degree than is common;

sentences.sentence: "an especially (or specially) cautious approach to the danger"

sentences.cn: 这是我特地为你做的。
sentences.en: I made it especially for you.

sentences.cn: 那天我并不十分高兴。
sentences.en: I wasn't feeling especially happy that day.

sentences.cn: “你喜欢他的小说吗？”“不十分喜欢。”
sentences.en: ‘Do you like his novels? ’ ‘Not especially. ’

sentences.cn: 这辆汽车很小，如果有孩子就尤其显得小。
sentences.en: The car is quite small, especially if you have children.

sentences.cn: 青少年，尤其是女孩，很注重时尚。
sentences.en: Teenagers are very fashion conscious, especially girls.

sentences.cn: 我喜爱罗马，尤其是春天的罗马。
sentences.en: I love Rome, especially in the spring.

sentences.cn: 尤其是在四五月份，不计其数的野花盛开，山谷里一片绚烂色彩。
sentences.en: Millions of wild flowers colour the valleys, especially in April and May...

sentences.cn: 每两个小时重新涂一次防晒油，尤其是在游泳的时候。
sentences.en: Re-apply sunscreen every two hours, especially if you have been swimming.

sentences.cn: 婴儿散热比成年人快得多，在出生后的头一个月特别容易感冒。
sentences.en: Babies lose heat much faster than adults, and are especially vulnerable to the cold in their first month.

sentences.cn: 选择在旅途中带上什么东西,当然是您的个人问题.
sentences.en: What ever you choose to bring on your travels is of course an individual matter.

sentences.cn: 这些公司将大量资金投入生物工艺学研究, 尤其是药品和新种子方面.
sentences.en: The companies are pouring trillions of yen into biotechnology research, especially for pharmaceuticals and new seeds.

sentences.cn: 芥末我吃不来.
sentences.en: I'm not especially fond of mustard.

sentences.cn: 我喜欢乡村,尤其在春天.
sentences.en: I like the country especially in spring.

sentences.cn: 我对数学问题特别感兴趣.
sentences.en: I am especially by math problems.

sentences.cn: 久别重逢,格外亲切.
sentences.en: People feel especially drawn to one another when they have been reunited after many years of separation.

sentences.cn: 构成那部小说开头部分的几章特别好.
sentences.en: The chapters that comprise the first part of the novel are especially good.

sentences.cn: 这里的瓜果, 尤其是无核葡萄驰名全国.
sentences.en: The place is nationally known for its melons and fruit, especially its seedless grapes.

sentences.cn: 由于她出身王族,这门婚事被认为是奇耻大辱.
sentences.en: The marriage was considered especially ignominious since she was of royal descent.

sentences.cn: 此地盛产水果, 尤以梨桃著称.
sentences.en: The place abounds with fruit, especially pears and peaches.

sentences.cn: 最好别呆得太久而惹人讨厌, 特别是初次拜访.
sentences.en: It's better not to outstay one's welcome, especially on a first visit.

sentences.cn: 他穿上这套衣服真精神.
sentences.en: The suit made him look especially impressive.

sentences.cn: 我们反对任何形式的虐待, 尤其是虐待儿童.
sentences.en: We stand against all forms of cruelty, especially to children.

sentences.cn: 他们希望这种新药能在缓解疼痛方面产生特效。
sentences.en: They hope the new drug will prove especially efficacious in the relief of pain.

sentences.cn: 尤其地,位于幸福之地的公司在研发（研究和开发)上投入更多。
sentences.en: Especially, firms in happy places spend more on R and D (research and development).

sentences.cn: 在作了九年摩尼教听众的奥古斯丁领导之下的反对派尤其地在非洲增长.
sentences.en: Opposition was especially strong in Africa under Augustine, who for nine years had been a Hearer.

sentences.cn: 这些崇拜尤其地采用为她的儿子耶稣基督的代祷方式.
sentences.en: This veneration especially takes the form of prayer for intercession with her Son, Jesus Christ.

sentences.cn: 特别是在这样一个不符合季节又冷又动的晚上这格外地正确.
sentences.en: That was especially true on an unseasonably cold, breezy night.

Sentence.sentence: Shouldn't preparing—and consuming—food be a source of comfort, pride, health, well-being, relaxation, sociability? Something that connects us to other humans? Why would we want to outsource ( ' , 外包 ) this basic task, especially when outsourcing it is so harmful? When I talk about cooking, I'm not talking about creating elaborate dinner parties or three-day science projects.
